content: भंजन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [भंज् ल्यु ल्युट् वा] {@--1@} Breaking, splitting. {@--2@} Arresting, checking. {@--3@} Frustrating. {@--4@} Causing violent pain. --नं {@--1@} Breaking down, shattering, destroying. {@--2@} Removing, dispelling, driving away; तदुदितभयभंजनाय यूनां <ls>Gīt. 10.</ls> {@--3@} Routing, vanquishing. {@--4@} Frustrating. {@--5@} Checking, interrupting, disturbing. {@--6@} Afflicting, paining --नः Decay of the teeth.
